Title: Relates to requiring Belleayre Mountain to accept the New York state office of parks, recreation and historic preservation empire passport at its facility
Summary: Requires Belleayre Mountain to accept the New York state office of parks, recreation and historic preservation empire passport at its facility.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to requiring Belleayre Mountain to accept the New York state office of parks, recreation and historic preservation empire passport at its facility
